summary: Mid-Senior Mobile Developer with 6 years of experience designing and deploying high-impact iOS/Android applications. Proficient in Swift, Kotlin, and React Native, with a track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver 10+ apps serving 500K+ users. Specializes in performance optimization and clean architecture implementation.

responsibilities: Led iOS/Android team in rebuilding flagship e-commerce app using SwiftUI and Jetpack Compose, improving user retention by 35%
Reduced app crash rate by 60% through implementation of advanced memory management techniques
Integrated React Native modules to enable cross-platform features for 3 enterprise applications
Mentored 4 junior developers in modern mobile architecture patterns (MVVM, VIPER)
experience.title: Senior Mobile Developer

responsibilities: Migrated legacy Objective-C codebase to Swift, improving maintainability and reducing build times by 25%
Developed real-time fitness tracking Android app with Kotlin Coroutines and Room DB
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Fastlane for automated app deployments
Optimized network layer to reduce API response time by 40% through protocol buffers integration
experience.title: Mobile Developer
